summary: Adds a craftable and upgradable armor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=blue]Himug√ºegeli Armor[/size][size=0.5]for CBBE[/size][/color]

Update Jan 12 2014: v1.01 uploaded. Now the boots have textures... I forgot to include them in the initial release.

[size=4]This mod adds a [u]craftable[/u] (in the hide section) and [u]upgradeable[/u] armor for the CBBE body to the game.
Please note that this is my first armor I've made for Sykrim, so it will be far from perfect (especially the textures).

Make sure your characters weight is set to 0, or else you might get seams on the hands.
To do that, open the console and type "player.setnpcweight 0" or adjust it in the character creation menu.

[b]A special thx to Nightasy for his assistance and his youtube tutorials. With them, even a monkey can create an armor for skyrim.
Check out his videos: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19249]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19249[/url][/b]

[color=red]If you like the armor, please endorse, so I know I did something right :)[/color]
And please leave your feedback in the comment section!
Feel free to upload your screenshots, I'd love to see them!

For now, the weight slider is not supported. I will try to get this working asap.

It only requires Skyrim and [b]NO DLC's[/b].
Use NMM to easily install and uninstall the mod, or manually drop it in your skyrim/data folder.

As pictures say more than words, here are some pictures of my first creation.

[img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/2887/1r6n.jpg[/img]

[color=red]How to get it ingame:[/color]
Simply craft it at a forge in the hide section. You'll need the following items:
Armor: 4 Leather Strips, 2 Leather
Boots: 1 Snow Bear Pelt, 2 Leather
To upgrade it, use a workbench and the following items:
Armor: 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather
Boots: 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

Or if you want the armor right away, use the console and type [color=red]"help himu"[/color] to get the IDs.[/size]
[/center]
author: tschutschi
